com.mindfusion.common
Class GeneralFormat

java.lang.Object
  com.mindfusion.common.GeneralFormat

public class GeneralFormat
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates a string that can be used to format arbitrary objects.

The format has the following specification:
Text {PropertyName} Text

Constructor Summary

          Initializes a new instance of the GeneralFormat class.
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String process(java.lang.Object value)
          Converts the specified object to a string according to the underlying formatting string.
